mapper.select: select * from project_list where ach_state = "상환완료" || ach_state = "중도상환"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO invest_list (invest_price, invest_date, user_num, busi_num, project_num) VALUE(#{invest_price}, NOW(), #{user_num}, #{busi_num}, #{project_num})
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(invest_price) invest_price, p.busi_num FROM invest_list i, project_list p WHERE i.project_num = p.project_num AND p.busi_num = #{p_busi_num} AND (i.user_num = #{user_num} OR i.busi_num = #{busi_num}) AND p.ach_state = '투자하기'
